verbose_text: In this formulation of nanoparticles, radionuclide 131 I emitting strong beta and gamma rays could serve as a theranostic agent for nuclear imaging guided RIT, while PTX as a typical anticancer drug could induce the self-assembly of HSA, so as to improve the blood circulation half-life, tumor specific uptake and intra-tumoral diffusion ability.
evidence: PTX as a typical anticancer drug could induce the self-assembly of HSA
